title: Warner Music’s Head of NFTs and AI Departs: Report
description: Oana Ruxandra, Warner’s chief digital officer, is officially departing the label after spearheading its aggressive push to embrace emerging technologies.

title: SBF Trial Day 2 – Prosecution’s opening statement paints SBF as a fraud mastermind, Defense claims complete innocence
description:
The second day of Sam Bankman-Fried trial began with the continuation of the jury selection process, which was concluded within a few hours — allowing the trial to start in full with both the prosecution and the defense presenting their opening arguments. The Department of Justice (DOJ) presented strong allegations against the FTX founder. The […]

title: SEC Seeks Rejection of Coinbase’s Pushback Against Its Lawsuit
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has asked a judge to reject Coinbase’s attempt to have the regulator’s lawsuit against it dismissed. The exchange had alleged that the agency overstepped its authority and abused its discretion in claiming that digital assets offered on the trading platform were unregistered securities. title: Can central banks ensure CBDCs reach everyone? The reality
description: Central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) are frequently hailed as the great equalizer, a tool to bring financial accessibility to every individual’s doorstep. Yet, a deep dive into a recent discussion paper by the Bank of Canada offers a sobering perspective.
